mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kuncun( product_id, store_id, status, num, date, total, order_info_id, product_price, purchase_price, money, supplier_id, customer_id, jia, nums )VALUES ( #{product_id}, #{store_id}, #{status}, #{num}, #{date}, #{total}, #{order_info_id}, #{product_price}, #{purchase_price}, #{money}, #{supplier_id}, #{customer_id}, #{jia}, #{num} )

INSERT INTO kuncun( product_id, store_id, status, num, date, total, order_info_id, customer_id, purchase_price, money, supplier_id, jia, nums )VALUE
(#{item.product_id},#{store_id},#{status},#{item.num},#{date},#{item.total},#{order_info_id},#{customer_id},"","",'0',#{jia},#{item.num})

INSERT INTO kuncun( product_id, store_id, status, num, date, total, purchase_price, product_price, money, supplier_id, order_info_id, jia, nums, id )VALUE
(#{item.product_id},#{store_id},#{status},#{item.num},#{date},#{item.total},#{item.purchase_price},#{item.product_price},#{item.total},#{supplier_id},#{supplier_order_info_id},'0',#{item.num},#{id})

INSERT INTO kuncun( product_id, store_id, status, num, nums, date, total, order_info_id, customer_id, purchase_price, product_price, money, supplier_id, jia, id )VALUE
(#{item.product_id},#{store_id},#{status},#{item.num},#{item.num},#{date},#{item.total},#{order_info_id},#{customer_id},#{item.product_price},#{item.product_price},"",'0',#{jia},#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT kuncun_id, product_id, store_id, status, num, date, order_info_id, supplier_id, jia, revokes FROM kuncun WHERE product_id=#{pd.product_id} and revokes='0' and( status='0' or status='2' or status='3' ) ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT SUM(money) as money from kuncun WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and status='2' and num>0 and revokes='0'

SELECT kuncun_id, product_id, store_id, status, num, nums, date, total, order_info_id, purchase_price, money, supplier_id, jia FROM kuncun WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and product_id=#{product_id} and (status='2' or status='3') and jia='0' and nums>0 and revokes='0' ORDER BY kuncun_id

SELECT kuncun_id, product_id, store_id, status, num, date, total, order_info_id, purchase_price, money, supplier_id, jia FROM kuncun WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and product_id=#{product_id} and (status='2' or status='3') and jia='0' and revokes='0' ORDER BY date DESC limit 1
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(num),0) as num FROM kuncun WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and num!=0

SELECT kuncun_id, product_id, store_id, status, num, nums, date, total, order_info_id, purchase_price, money, supplier_id, jia FROM kuncun WHERE order_info_id=#{return_order_info_id} and status='5' and jia='0'
SELECT SUM(nums) as nums, SUM(num) as num FROM kuncun WHERE order_info_id=#{supplier_order_info_id}
